form.label: darkfalcon_tactic_scenario_link
form.description: Used for linking tactics to FireDrill projects and scenarios

search.query: |inputlookup df_firedrill_scenario_detail.csv| rename id as scenario_id name as scenario_name | eval scenario_name=type." - ".scenario_name| sort scenario_name

| inputlookup df_tactic_scenario_map.csv
| append [ stats count | eval TacticID = "$input_tactic_id$" | eval ProjectID= "$input_project_id$" | eval ScenarioID= "$input_scenario_id$" | eval SophisticationIfBlockedRating= "$input_sophistication_blocked$" | eval SophisticationIfAllowedRating= "$input_sophistication_allowed$"
| eval temp_dt = now() | eval DateAdded = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | fields - _raw _time count | table * | join type=outer [ |rest /services/authentication/current-context/context | fields username| where username!="splunk-system-user" | rename username AS Contact]]
| eval SophisticationIfBlockedScore=case(SophisticationIfBlockedRating=="Novice", 0,SophisticationIfBlockedRating=="Practitioner", 30, SophisticationIfBlockedRating=="Expert", 60, SophisticationIfBlockedRating=="Innovator", 100) | eval SophisticationIfAllowedScore=case(SophisticationIfAllowedRating=="Novice", 0,SophisticationIfAllowedRating=="Practitioner", 30, SophisticationIfAllowedRating=="Expert", 60, SophisticationIfAllowedRating=="Innovator", 100)
| sort -temp_dt | dedup TacticID ProjectID ScenarioID | fields - temp_dt | sort - DateAdded
| outputlookup df_tactic_scenario_map.csv
| where TacticID="$input_tactic_id$" and ProjectID="$input_project_id$" and ScenarioID="$input_scenario_id$"

| inputlookup df_tactic_scenario_map.csv
| join type=left ScenarioID[ | inputlookup df_firedrill_scenario_detail.csv | rename name as Scenario id as ScenarioID| fields ScenarioID Scenario]
| join type=left ProjectID[ | inputlookup df_firedrill_results.csv | dedup ProjectID| fields ProjectID ProjectName]
| join type=left TacticID[ | inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]
| rename SophisticationIfBlockedRating as "Sophistication If Blocked" | rename SophisticationIfAllowedRating as "Sophistication If Allowed"
| table TacticID Tactic ProjectName Scenario "Sophistication If Blocked" "Sophistication If Allowed" DateAdded Contact
